name: Bioinorganic Chemistry
description: This course will explore the role of metals cations in living systems. After a survey of biologically relevant ligands (such as amino and nucleic acids) the focus shifts to metal uptake and function. The course also provides a brief introduction to medicinal inorganic chemistry.
prerequisites: [[BIOC12H3 and BIOC13H3] or CHMB62H3] and CHMC31Y3
